mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) from basket where email = #{email}
select * from basket where email = #{email} limit #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into basket(id, email, productCode, productName, price, count, total) values(0, #{email},#{productCode},#{productName},#{price},#{count},#{total})
mapper.update: update basket set readcount = readcount + 1 where id = #{id}
update basket set count=#{count}, #{total} where id=#{id}
